text: Todor Lazić (; 30 August 1930 – 19 July 2000) was a Serbian basketball coach. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2000 deaths Category:FC Barcelona Bàsquet coaches Category:KK Dinamo Pančevo coaches Category:KK Zastava coaches Category:ŽKK Dinamo Pančevo coaches Category:OKK Beograd coaches Category:Serbian expatriate basketball people in Italy Category:Serbian expatriate basketball people in Spain Category:Serbian men's basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Belgrade Category:Yugoslav basketball coaches
title: Todor Lazić
